{CHOICE}- Beginner's Edition”

ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // “Mission Orders”
Presently on the ocean floor near Junon,
a Red Leader Submarine carrying
Huge Materia is being escorted
by covert Shinra Submarine Units.{PAUSE} Furthermore, it has been confirmed that
several mines have been dispersed
onto the ocean floor.{PAUSE} The ocean floor can only be monitored with
Shinra's Sonar Radar Screen.{PAUSE} Enemy subs can only be detected
within the Sonar area.
Get in front of the detected enemy sub
and "Lock On"!!{PAUSE} Push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to fire the torpedo!{PAUSE} The mines are found on the radar screen
at the top of the indicators.
The mines inflict great damage,
so be careful!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // “Objective”
Sink the Red Leader Submarine
carrying the Huge Materia!
Time Limit: 10 minutes!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // “Advice”
1. Get the enemy submarine in front of you!
2. Concentrate attack
{CHOICE} on the Red Leader Submarine!
3. If you lose track of the enemy,
{CHOICE} push {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} and use your radar!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // “Submarine Operation Manual
{CHOICE}- Intermediate Edition”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // “Radar Screen”
The mines are found at the top of
the indicators on the screen.{PAUSE} The basic strategies are
to 1) avoid the indicators,
and 2) "Lock On" to enemies from behind.{PAUSE} The lower gauge shows
the sub's remaining power.
The right gauge shows the sub's speed.
Other warnings are as follows…{PAUSE} WARNING…Enemy submarine detected nearby!
ALERT…Approaching torpedo detected!
MINE…Mine detected nearby!
CONFLICT…Collision with the ocean floor!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // “Submarine Operation Manual
{CHOICE}- Advanced Edition”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // “Other Controls”
{PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE}: Climb
{PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE}: Sight
{PURPLE}[CAMERA]{WHITE}: Dive
{PURPLE}[TARGET]{WHITE}: View
{PURPLE}[START]{WHITE}: Help & Pause

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // “How to release the "Lock On" mode”
If the sub leaves the center of
the sonar screen,
the "Lock On" mode will reset.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // “When Locked On by an enemy torpedo”
Shift up to maximum speed by pressing
{PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE} repeatedly.{PAUSE} This will enable you to speed up
past the maximum speed
and outrun the torpedo!
…That is all.
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:8, speed:4});
fade({r:80, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:40, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:5, adjust:255});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:4, speed:64});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:4, speed:64});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:42}); // “Controls”
{PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}: Speed Up
{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}: Fire!
{PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}: Speed Dn
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:102}); // Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:43}); // “Directional controls”
Up: Descend
Left: Left rotation
Right: Right rotation
Down: Ascend

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:104}); // “Piloting a submarine is very difficult!
I am completely clueless!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “We don't have much time left!
I don't want to die!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:105}); // “I thank you!
I am happy to be a hostage!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “There's still so much more I've got to do!”{PAUSE}“I never even got to do my special
victory dance in battle!”

dialogStrings:
“We don't have much time left!
I don't want to die!”

“There's still so much more I've got to do!”{PAUSE}“I never even got to do my special
victory dance in battle!”

“All right!!
Then make this your first victory!!”{PAUSE}“Go on, show 'em!!”

“I'm back!
An' now I got no regrets!!”

{Cloud}
“Someone…please.
I'm sorry I can't take it anymore.”{PAUSE}“The lack of space, the shaking,
the roar of the engine…”

{Barret}
“Stop your blubberin'!!
How we gonna move this without you?”

{Cid}
“DAMN!
I've GOT to get back in the air!”

{Tifa}
“What are we going to do?
We stole a submarine but can't pilot it.”

{Cait Sith}
“I can't fit in this seat…"
No good!”

{Tifa}
“See!?”{PAUSE}“Just fiddle with the controls,
and we'll get somewhere!”

{Tifa}
“Hey {Cloud}?
Why don't you try piloting it?”{PAUSE}“They say you don't get motion sickness
if you're driving.”

{Barret}
“EY!! Looks likes we're almost on our way!
Just keep on fiddlin' with it!!”{PAUSE}“It's all up to you!”

{Barret}
“Don't worry!”{PAUSE}“If it breaks down,
I'll smack it one. That'll fix it!”

{Vincent}
“I'm not very mechanical, but
it seems like we're starting to move.”{PAUSE}“Hang in there.”

{Cloud}
“Hey, you're right…
I DO feel a little better driving.”{PAUSE}“No sweat. Just leave everything to me.”

{Cloud}
“Well, now what?”
{CHOICE}Read the manual
{CHOICE}Sit in the seat
{CHOICE}Leave it alone

{Cloud}
“Everything seems set…”
{CHOICE}Read the manual
{CHOICE}Start the mission!

“Directional controls”
Up: Descend
Left: Left rotation
Right: Right rotation
Down: Ascend

“Mission Orders”
Presently on the ocean floor near Junon,
a Red Leader Submarine carrying
Huge Materia is being escorted
by covert Shinra Submarine Units.{PAUSE} Furthermore, it has been confirmed that
several mines have been dispersed
onto the ocean floor.{PAUSE} The ocean floor can only be monitored with
Shinra's Sonar Radar Screen.{PAUSE} Enemy subs can only be detected
within the Sonar area.
Get in front of the detected enemy sub
and "Lock On"!!{PAUSE} Push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to fire the torpedo!{PAUSE} The mines are found on the radar screen
at the top of the indicators.
The mines inflict great damage,
so be careful!

“Objective”
Sink the Red Leader Submarine
carrying the Huge Materia!
Time Limit: 10 minutes!

“Advice”
1. Get the enemy submarine in front of you!
2. Concentrate attack
{CHOICE} on the Red Leader Submarine!
3. If you lose track of the enemy,
{CHOICE} push {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} and use your radar!

“Radar Screen”
The mines are found at the top of
the indicators on the screen.{PAUSE} The basic strategies are
to 1) avoid the indicators,
and 2) "Lock On" to enemies from behind.{PAUSE} The lower gauge shows
the sub's remaining power.
The right gauge shows the sub's speed.
Other warnings are as follows…{PAUSE} WARNING…Enemy submarine detected nearby!
ALERT…Approaching torpedo detected!
MINE…Mine detected nearby!
CONFLICT…Collision with the ocean floor!

“Loading torpedoes”
Preparation time is needed before
the next torpedo can be fired.
Take your time, and don't waste your shots!

“How to release the "Lock On" mode”
If the sub leaves the center of
the sonar screen,
the "Lock On" mode will reset.

“Other Controls”
{PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE}: Climb
{PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE}: Sight
{PURPLE}[CAMERA]{WHITE}: Dive
{PURPLE}[TARGET]{WHITE}: View
{PURPLE}[START]{WHITE}: Help & Pause

“When Locked On by an enemy torpedo”
Shift up to maximum speed by pressing
{PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE} repeatedly.{PAUSE} This will enable you to speed up
past the maximum speed
and outrun the torpedo!
…That is all.

{Cloud}
“Phew! We did it!!”{PAUSE}“The Huge Materia should be at the bottom
of the sea by now.
Let's continue the search…”
“…All Shinra Submarine Units, do you read…?”

{Tifa}
“No. 2…”{PAUSE}“…I saw that written at the dock!
They must mean this sub.”

“…We will transport the Huge Materia
from the airport…”

“…Those without other assignments
will report for guard duty…”

{Cloud}
“{CYAN}Junon Airport{WHITE}…
We should make it if we hurry.”

{Cloud}
“Forget about the Huge Materia for now.”{PAUSE}“We're climbing!”

{Barret}
“#%$@! What's all this 'Climbing!' crap?
Gimme a break!”

{Yuffie}
“Climbing…arrrgh…my ears…!
LET ME OUT--I HATE THIS!”

{Vincent}
“First the ocean, now the air…
What a busy day.”

{Cloud}
“…We lost.
I guess I'm just not cut out for all this.”

{Cloud}
“Hear that?
{CYAN}Junon Airport{WHITE}!”{PAUSE}“We can still get the Huge Materia back!
Let's hurry!”

{Cloud}
“It seems like a key to somewhere…”
“…Estimated to be several thousand years old…”

{Cloud}
“Damn…makes me sick just thinking about it…”
“…No damage appears to have been sustained…”

“Piloting a submarine is very difficult!
I am completely clueless!”

“I thank you!
I am happy to be a hostage!”

akao.name: sea
akao.description: A Secret, Sleeping in the Deep Sea
